title: Obari
author: Obari
content: I suppose go the appropriate board but dem no go gree give me because of some issues and sincerely I really get very serious emergency I suppose attend to tomorrow and the local board na the only place I fit run to at this time so I Dey plead if anybody Dey here wey fit help me out as I Dey very sure say I go deliver by Sunday I been need 50k to complete this money make dem fit do this work for me. Thanks in advance.

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: If eh be say you no go fail by that Sunday I fit give you stable coin $45 to pay back $50 by that Sunday and everything go they open here for the thread for reference purpose. If you gree to take stablecoins you let me know, and as you carry you mouth talk when you wan pay back, if eh pass that same date of repayment Shebi extra interest go also they attached to am ??

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Before sending money to anyone, tell the person to sign a message with one of his old bitcoin addresses or staked addresses. Or using PGP key encryption and decryption for it. Just to know that you are not dealing with a compromised account.He should include today's date in the signed message.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: I think the lending board is the most appropriate place you could have use in making this request, creating a thread for this purpose is not worth it at all, or maybe it's something you could have contacted your friends or those close to you on that, assuming if we already have sub boards now on the local board, this thread will automatically ended up in off topic discussion, sometimes we need to cut our clothes according to our sizes.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Doan9269 on November 13, 2023, 09:18:38 AMassuming if we already have sub boards now on the local board, this thread will automatically ended up in off topic discussion, sometimes we need to cut our clothes according to our sizes. This is not off-topic thread. If only those two boards, naija politics & society and off-topic boards are created, this thread will stay on the naija main board. You are not wrong that lending board is appropriate for it but it can also be on local board. I guess OP decided not to borrow another money after he was tagged for having an active loan and not paying as at the time and also linked to alt.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: I think it’s better and faster to get loan in crypto than I fiat currency, even as here is our local board most people still want anything transactions that has to do with this forum to be in crypto and not fait, individuals with their own reason and I also understand the reason why you don’t want to get crypto from your local due to wallet transactions connection, even as that I still think that won’t matter as this thread is public and it could be used for reference purpose having your wallet link to that of others in respect of this transaction won’t do the person any harm. @Obari I think it’s right time you lock up the thread since you have already gotten the loan from Royse777 continuing conversation in this thread might just make no sense or add no value to what you need.  Or more people might also come to offer you their help not knowing that you have already gotten the help else where.
